vulkanmod.options.advCulling.tooltip: Use a culling algorithm that might improve performance by reducing the number of non-visible chunk sections rendered.
vulkanmod.options.ao.subBlock.tooltip: ON (Sub-block): Enables smooth lighting for non-full blocks (experimental).
vulkanmod.options.entityCulling.tooltip: Enables culling for entities in non-visible sections.
vulkanmod.options.frameQueue.tooltip: Higher values might help stabilize frame time but will increase input lag.
vulkanmod.options.indirectDraw.tooltip: Reduces CPU overhead but might increase GPU overhead.
vulkanmod.options.uniqueOpaqueLayer.tool: Use a unique render layer for opaque terrain to improve performance.
